alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sangamon and southeastern Morgan Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chatham to near Loami to near Franklin. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Springfield and Chatham around 720 PM CDT. Auburn around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pawnee and Divernon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 77 and 88. Interstate 72 between mile markers 90 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
